name: Australian BoM Radar Loop
description: Creates animated radar loops and individual images from Australian Bureau of Meteorology radar data for use in dashboards and LLM Vision analysis

radar_product_id.name: Radar Product ID
radar_product_id.description: Primary radar product ID (e.g., IDR022 for Melbourne 256km). See RADARS.md for all available radars.

timezone.name: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone for radar timestamps (e.g., Australia/Melbourne, Australia/Sydney)

update_interval.name: Update Interval (seconds)
update_interval.description: How often to check for new radar images

output_path.name: Output Path
output_path.description: Path relative to /config/ where images will be saved (default: www/bom_radar)

layers.name: Radar Layers
layers.description: Select which radar overlay layers to include

gif_duration.name: GIF Frame Duration (ms)
gif_duration.description: Duration each frame is displayed in the animated GIF

gif_last_frame_duration.name: Last Frame Duration (ms)
gif_last_frame_duration.description: Duration the final frame is displayed (creates a pause effect)

residential_location_enabled.name: Show Home Location
residential_location_enabled.description: Add a house icon marker at your residential location

second_radar_enabled.name: Enable Second Radar
second_radar_enabled.description: Overlay a second radar for extended coverage

second_radar_product_id.name: Second Radar Product ID
second_radar_product_id.description: Product ID for the second radar overlay

third_radar_enabled.name: Enable Third Radar
third_radar_enabled.description: Overlay a third radar for maximum coverage

third_radar_product_id.name: Third Radar Product ID
third_radar_product_id.description: Product ID for the third radar overlay
